author: Simon Difford
description: A spicy, flavour-packed hot coffee. Lightly whip or simply shake cream in container before pouring over the bowl of a spoon. It also helps if the cream is gently warmed.
name: Mexicano (Hot)
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: POUR tequila and liqueur into warmed glass and top with coffee
